description: Dashboard for Varken using InfluxDB v2 and Flux

options.content:
# THIS DASHBOARD IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH InfluxQL!

## Notes
This dashboard is a WIP and is not 100% complete. It relies on a specific build of Varken using a PR for InfluxDB v2 Support. This dashboard is for dev testing InfluxDB v2 support and updated to support Grafana v9+. Not all features from the v1.6.x of Varken's dashboard are supported.

Most panels are in working order with minor issues. Panels that are still WIP are collapsed in a row at the bottom. If you are familiar with Flux queries feel free to submit a PR to update the dev dashboard! :)

## How to use
Update the variables in this dashboard's settings to reflect your environment. Then save it!

targets.query:
from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_bandwidth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "current_stream_stats")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "lan_bandwidth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "current_stream_stats")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "wan_bandwidth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "current_stream_stats")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pending")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Request_Counts")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "approved")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Request_Counts")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "available")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Request_Counts")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${movieslibrary}/)
  |> distinct()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${movieslibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${tvlibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "seasons")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${tvlibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "episodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${tvlibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "stream_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "current_stream_stats")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "transcode_streams")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "current_stream_stats")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "direct_play_streams")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "current_stream_stats")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "direct_streams")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "current_stream_stats")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pending")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Issues_Counts")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "resolved")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Issues_Counts")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_progress")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Issues_Counts")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "episodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${tvlibrary}/)
  |> distinct()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${movies4klibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${tv4klibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "seasons")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${tv4klibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "episodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "library_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.section_name =~ /^${tv4klibrary}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Session")
  |> group(columns: ["device_type"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "device_type"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Session")
  |> group(columns: ["video_decision"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "video_decision"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Radarr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Queue")
  |> group(columns: ["name", "protocol_id", "quality"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "name", "protocol_id", "quality"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Session")
  |> group(columns: ["latitude", "longitude", "full_location", "name"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "latitude", "longitude", "full_location", "name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sonarr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Queue")
  |> group(columns: ["protocol_id", "sxe", "name"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "protocol_id", "sxe", "name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sonarr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Future")
  |> group(columns: ["downloaded", "name", "sxe"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "downloaded", "name", "sxe"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Session")
  |> group(columns: ["friendly_name", "title", "quality", "video_decision", "quality_profile", "platform", "product_version", "location", "player_state"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "friendly_name", "title", "quality", "video_decision", "quality_profile", "platform", "product_version", "location", "player_state"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sonarr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "Missing")
  |> group(columns: ["server", "sxe", "name"])
  |> distinct()
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Radarr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Missing_Available"] == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hash")
  |> group(columns: ["name", "titleSlug"])
  |> distinct()
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Tautulli")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: distinct, createEmpty: false)
  |> count()
  |> fill(value: 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "varken")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "hash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "Requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.status != 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.status != 2)
  |> group(columns: ["title", "requested_date", "requested_user", "request_type", "status"], mode: "by")
  |> distinct()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "title", "requested_date", "requested_user", "request_type", "status"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
